messages.content: Generate citizen reactions to the mayor's promises.
build solar panels on all public buildings

Generate citizen reactions to the mayor's promises.
The mayor promises to 'cut corporate taxes by 20% to attract investment'.

{'reactions': [{'name': 'Ella Green', 'type': 'environmentalist', 'dialogue': 'I’m really concerned about this. Cutting corporate taxes might bring in more business, but it could also lead to less investment in environmental protections.'}, {'name': 'Henry Smith', 'type': 'business_owner', 'dialogue': 'This is fantastic news! Lower taxes will allow my business to invest more and create jobs.'}, {'name': 'Ava Johnson', 'type': 'student', 'dialogue': 'I don’t know if this is a good idea. We need more funding for education, not less tax revenue.'}, {'name': 'Tom Baker', 'type': 'worker', 'dialogue': 'I hope this brings in more jobs, but I’m worried about the impact on our city’s services.'}, {'name': 'Dr. Emily White', 'type': 'scientist', 'dialogue': 'We need to ensure that any tax cuts don’t come at the expense of funding for important research and sustainability initiatives.'}]}
